Particle size.pristine NCM: secondary particles (about 11.7 μm), primary particles with average diameters of 170 to 230 nm
Particle size.M-NCM: secondary particles (about 11.7 μm), primary particles with average diameters of 170 to 230 nm

Coating layer characteristics.M-NCM: thin Li3PO4 coating layer with about 1.8 nm thickness
